item.title: Gold Futures Set to End Week Slightly Up on Safe-Haven Demand
item.description: Gold futures fell, but remained on track to finish the first trading week of the year up on safe-haven demand.

item.title: U.S. Natural Gas Extends Losses on Below-Estimate Storage Draw
item.description: U.S. natural gas futures extended their losses after a draw on inventories was less than forecast.
